ModulesGarden is happy to announce a triple release of very long-awaited module updates. Ladies and gentlemen, here they are, SolusVM Extended modules for WHMCS in their new versions!

- SolusVM Extended VPS For WHMCS 1.3
- SolusVM Extended Cloud For WHMCS 1.3
- SolusVM Extended Reseller For WHMCS 1.2.2

Link to changelog: [http://www.modulesgarden.com/products/whmcs/solusvm_extended_modules/changelog](http://www.modulesgarden.com/products/whmcs/solusvm_extended_modules/changelog)

**1. SolusVM Extended VPS For WHMCS** will allow you to automate the provisioning of virtual servers to your customers who will be able to purchase and manage them directly from your WHMCS client area.

Link to module page: [http://www.modulesgarden.com/products/whmcs/solusvm_extended_vps/features](http://www.modulesgarden.com/products/whmcs/solusvm_extended_vps/features)

**2. SolusVM Extended Cloud For WHMCS** will let your customers to order, create and manage multiple virtual servers in your WHMCS client area. Owing to module your clients will be able to freely add, remove, rebuild and upgrade virtual servers according to their needs. The decision of resource limit usage belongs entirely to customers and is limited only by the products prepared by you.

Link to module page: [http://www.modulesgarden.com/products/whmcs/solusvm_extended_cloud/features](http://www.modulesgarden.com/products/whmcs/solusvm_extended_cloud/features)

**3. SolusVM Extended Reseller For WHMCS** module will allow you to automate the creation and provisioning of complete products to your resellers. Such products consist of specified server resources like available number of users, number of virtual machines or amount of disk space. Owing to our module you can sell those products to your resellers who will offer included resources to their own customers through the WHMCS! 

Link to module page: [http://www.modulesgarden.com/products/whmcs/solusvm_extended_reseller/features](http://www.modulesgarden.com/products/whmcs/solusvm_extended_reseller/features)
